posts.post_content:
Hi!

I am interested in purchasing a T206 Cobb. I would be interested in all poses except the bat on shoulder.

In regards to condition, I am simply looking for a decent eye appeal no matter the grade. 
very highly graded pieces will likely not be in my budget for this particular one.

If you have one you are interested in moving, please feel free to PM me.

Thank you very much.

Derek
mission accomplished. thank you again net54 :) ... down with ebay!!!!
